title: Blue State Coffee
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Spot for coffee and lunch. The breads are all vegan. Has vegan mayo and cheese, house-made hummus with bagel chips; sometimes vegan soup and vegan chocolate cookies. Menu rotates seasonally. Try the chickpea salad sandwich on pressed panini bread or the tofu salad wrap.
